title: Handwritten script font...looks like something from renaissance times
content:
Hello

Need some help finding the hand written script font used on the black envelopes of these invites? It looks like something from the renaissance period but when searching for 'renaissance fonts' I've drawn a blank. Would very much appreciate any help.

Thanks in advance :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [jpeg-1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417092640/http:/typophile.com/files/jpeg-1.jpg) | 260.41 KB |
| [jpeg.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417092640/http:/typophile.com/files/jpeg_0.jpg) | 211.23 KB |
author: mcfee

comments.content:
Only confirming your title... Looks definitely handwritten to me, all repeating letters are different (sample [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417092640/http:/eventjubilee.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/WELL_WED_C10_-1477.jpg). According to [this post](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417092640/http:/annabriggsphotography.com/?p=2083), " [Coral Pheasant](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417092640/http:/www.coralpheasant.com/) purveyed of unique custom paper goods and stationary for weddings". Try asking them, they may answer.  
Some alternatives now: [Plumero Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417092640/http:/marketplace.veer.com/font/Plumero-UMT0000018), [Saissant](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417092640/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/magpiepaperworks/saissant/), [Vermandois](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417092640/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/magpiepaperworks/vermandois/), [Jacques and Gilles](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417092640/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/jacques-and-gilles/), [Carolyna](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417092640/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/carolyna-pro-black/), [Peoni](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417092640/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/peoni-pro/), [Bombshell](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417092640/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/bombshell-pro/), [Cursive CK](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417092640/http:/www.creatingkeepsakes.com/articles/CK_Cursive), [Anna Clara](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417092640/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/trial-by-cupcakes/anna-clara), [Cantoni](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417092640/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/debi-sementelli/cantoni), [Asterism](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417092640/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/great-lakes-lettering/asterism), [Key Notes](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417092640/http:/the-lilypad.com/store/Key-Notes.html), [Ondise](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417092640/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/magpiepaperworks/ondise)
